Even with its faults, its often toxic community, and questionable chat censoring I still enjoy playing. Though I play very casually, maybe play for a few hours one week then forget about it for a bit.

That aside, if you enjoy what amounts to extreme hide and seek with a bit of Tag you're dead, you may get quite a bit enjoyment out of the game, find your favorite killer and punish those silly survivors for touching the generators.

As far as Survivor goes, can get the blood pumping for a while, you will be jump scared your first few games though you do eventually get over that with a few exceptions just enjoy the game and get better! Game does favor survivors (specially ones that work together).
